sortParamsByRequiredFlag.description: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters.

ensureUniqueParams.description: Whether to ensure parameter names are unique in an operation (rename parameters that are not).

allowUnicodeIdentifiers.description: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false

scmDeveloperConnection.description: SCM developer connection in generated pom.xml

developerOrganizationUrl.description: developer organization URL in generated pom.xml

localVariablePrefix.description: prefix for generated code members and local variables

serializableModel.description: boolean - toggle "implements Serializable" for generated models

bigDecimalAsString.description: Treat BigDecimal values as Strings to avoid precision loss.

fullJavaUtil.description: whether to use fully qualified name for classes under java.util. This option only works for Java API client

hideGenerationTimestamp.description: hides the timestamp when files were generated

withXml.description: whether to include support for application/xml content type and include XML annotations in the model (works with libraries that provide support for JSON and XML)

enum.legacy: Legacy java.util.Date (if you really have a good reason not to use threetenbp
enum.java8-localdatetime: Java 8 using LocalDateTime (for legacy app only)
enum.java8: Java 8 native JSR310 (preferred for jdk 1.8+) - note: this also sets "java8" to true

java8.description: Option. Use Java8 classes instead of third party equivalents

enum.true: Use Java 8 classes such as Base64
enum.false: Various third party libraries as needed

disableHtmlEscaping.description: Disable HTML escaping of JSON strings when using gson (needed to avoid problems with byte[] fields)

checkDuplicatedModelName.description: Check if there are duplicated model names (ignoring case)
